author: Mike Weatherford
title: Criss Angel's young son diagnosed with leukemia; shows canceled
text:
Criss Angel is taking a break from his Las Vegas magic show to deal with health issues of his 20-month-old son in Australia.
According to a news release, the magic star's son, Johnny Crisstopher Sarantakos (the last name is the magician's real last name), has been diagnosed with Acute Lymphobastic Leukemia.
Angel has canceled shows at Luxor starting today but plans to return to "Believe" on Nov. 4. Refunds and exchanges are available at the original pint of purchase.
This is a breaking news update. Check back for more information.
